div.p: My name’s Harry and my last job was a police officer. There are numerous facets to it, my last bit of employment in the police I was on
a gang unit, if you like, we had some problems with gangs here in Gloucester and stuff which were linked with drugs, we had some shootings
and other bits and pieces and a small taskforce was set up to sort of target these individuals, look at the gang culture within the city,
how far it extended out and target them, take them out and make the place a safer place so that’s what we did, we were successful with it,
it’s still going on now since I’ve left.
